subject: Web3
title: The Future of DeFi
description: A micro-lesson that makes The Future of DeFi usable.

hook.text: DeFi is five years old and already handles billions daily. The next decade will decide if it transforms or fades.

buildup.text: Better interfaces, cheaper transactions, and regulatory clarity could bring DeFi to millions of new users.

discovery.text: Layer 2 networks have already cut transaction costs by 99%. The cost barrier is falling fast.

twist.text: Regulation could either legitimize DeFi or restrict it into something unrecognizable. The outcome isn't clear.

climax.text: DeFi reimagined finance from scratch. Whether the world adopts it depends on trust, usability, and rules yet to be written.

punchline.text: DeFi rebuilt finance in five years. The next five will determine if anyone uses it.

quiz.question: What could most help DeFi achieve mainstream adoption?
options: Better interfaces, cheaper transactions, and regulatory clarity
